snippet: Newly released transcripts from Federal Reserve Board meetings in 2009 cover some of the darkest days of the financial crisis.
abstract: Gretchen Morgenson Fair Game column examines newly released minutes of Federal Reserve Board meetings from 2009; notes while biggest fears of critics of Fed programs to stabilize credit markets in wake of 2008 crisis never came to pass, regulators would do well to do the kinds of cost-benefit analyses of liquidity programs before another crisis ensues.
lead_paragraph: Newly released transcripts from Federal Reserve Board meetings in 2009 cover some of the darkest days of the financial crisis.

headline.print_headline: At the Fed, Rolling Dice in a Crisis
headline.main: At the Fed in 2009, Rolling the Dice in a Crisis
